original_text: saying, “Sirs, I perceive that the voyage will be with injury and much loss, not only of the cargo and the ship, but also of our lives.”
korean_text: 말하되 여러분이여 내가 보니 이번 항해가 하물과 배만 아니라 우리 생명에도 타격과 많은 손해를 끼치리라 하되

sentences.original_text: the voyage will be with injury and much loss,
sentences.korean_translation: 이 항해는 상처와 큰 손해를 입게 될 것입니다,

sentences.original_text: not only of the cargo and the ship,
